description: This file defines a Python class 'MemoryRow' using Pydantic for data validation and serialization, representing a memory record stored in a database with methods for serialization and ID generation.

classes.name: MemoryRow
classes.description: A data model representing a memory record with serialization and ID generation logic.

methods.name: serializable_dict
methods.description: Returns a dictionary representation of the MemoryRow, excluding timestamps and converting them to ISO format.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Returns a dictionary representation of the MemoryRow, identical to serializable_dict.

methods.name: generate_id
methods.description: Automatically generates a unique ID for the MemoryRow based on its memory content if not already set.
